vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.20;
son of: Shebuel (H7619)
§ Jehdeiah = "Jehovah is unity"
1) a Levite in the time of David
2) a Meronothite, officer of David in charge of the she-asses
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Subael; levita; en tiempos del rey David; (b)   de Meronot; funcionario; en tiempos del rey David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶希底亞 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "願耶和華賜下喜樂"
1) 大衛時一名利未人 (代上 24:20)
2) 米崙人, 大衛的官員, 職司母驢的掌管(代上 27:30)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
耶希底亚 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "愿耶和华赐下喜乐"
1) 大卫时一名利未人 (代上 24:20)
2) 米仑人, 大卫的官员, 职司母驴的掌管(代上 27:30)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.30
§ Jehdeiah = "Jehovah is unity"
1) a Levite in the time of David
2) a Meronothite, officer of David in charge of the she-asses
